message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer!  That price is a little high for me. Would you consider $80?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $160, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
It's still a bit more than I'm looking to spend. How about $100?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. I can do $140, but I really think you'll love this product at that price.
